alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 9:58PM CST until January 03 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Wild Rice River (ND) near Abercrombie affecting Richland County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Clay and Cass Counties. For the Red River...including Wahpeton and Fargo...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Wild Rice River (ND)...including Abercrombie...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Fargo. * WHEN...From Friday morning to late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, 3rd Street underpass is closed (Moorhead). * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CST Thursday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 17.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 21.0 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. late Friday night at 400 AM CST.
